message: You can take the smaller share, I'll take the larger share this time!
You took the bigger share last time, now it's my turn!
You're being greedy, I'll take the bigger share again!
I'll give you a slightly better deal this time, but don't get too comfortable!
You're running out of options, I'll take most of it now!
I'm not giving up yet, I'll try to make a comeback!
You're getting desperate, I'll take almost all of it now!
I'm not giving up yet, I'll try to make a last stand!
You're running out of time, I'll take most of it now, and you'll be left with almost nothing!
I'll give you the smallest share possible, but I'm not going down without a fight!
